CONVERSATION GROUP: Good question... I mean... uh what was his name again it was... Drizzt!  Drizzt Do'Urden, the famously heroic and conflicted drow elf!

You mean Drawde? That miserable old bastard took all the coin I had! And here I'm the one who showed him how to survive out here, told him how easy it was to fake blindness and uh... maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Look, we're both dwarves, we should be helping each other out.
I'd be happy to help!  Not for free, of course.
BK You want avenge the Gilded Eye?  After all they've done to you?

BK And now you do their errands for them.  How lovely.  Of course if your willing to help an enemy perhaps you'd be willing to leave a stranger, who has done you no harm, alone.  For the right compensation.
